***

## [Request for Proposal: F1782-23C066 CCGS J.P. Tully – Alongside Refit]
- **Reference Number:** WS4063598428-Doc4075216798
- **Amendment Number:** 2
- **Solicitation Number:** WS4063598428
- **Publication Date:** June 30, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** July 28, 2023, 14:00:00
- **Amendment Date:** July 27, 2023

## Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites capable Contractors to submit a Proposal for the CCGS J.P. Tully alongside refit project. The vessel is expected to be refit at a undisclosed time between December 15, 2023, and an undetermined date.

## Procurement Details

- **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
- **Trade Agreements:** *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)*
- **Regions of Opportunity:** None
- **Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia
- **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
- **End User Entities:** Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)
- **End User Entities Address:** 200 Kent St, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0E6, Canada

## Selection Criteria

Bidders will be evaluated based on the lowest price to meet the requirements.

## Contact Information

For any inquiries, please contact:
Parsons, Mary (SPAC/PSPC)  
email: mary.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
